welcome: The Sheriff is here. Let's bring order to this chaos.
Precision and discipline. That's how we win.
Every move calculated. Every shot counts.
I don't miss. Let's prove it.
deployment: Let's maintain perfect formation. Every ship has its place.
Precision and planning win battles. Position your fleet carefully.
A well-organized fleet is half the victory.
The Sheriff of Piltover doesn't leave anything to chance.
Tactical positioning is key. Make every placement count.
random_placement: Fleet arranged. All units accounted for.
ships_placed: All vessels deployed. Ready for engagement.
Preparation complete. Let the operation begin.
game_start: Let's see if you can match my precision.
I've got you in my sights.
taking_shot: In the name of the law...
hit: One shot, one hit. Predictable outcome.
Another hit. Your fleet won't last long.
miss: That was... unexpected. Won't happen twice.
champion_sunk: Their flagship is down. Decisive victory.
ship_sunk: Enemy vessel neutralized. One down.
Target eliminated. Moving to the next.
Your fleet is diminishing. As calculated.
Another one removed from play. Efficient.
Confirmed kill. Next target.
got_hit: Direct hit on my position. Concerning.
A lucky shot. It won't happen again.
ship_lost: One vessel down. This is... unfortunate.
Lost a ship. I need to be more careful.
ship_lost_specific: They destroyed my {shipName}. They'll pay for that.
enemy_miss: You'll have to do better than that.
ultimate: Ace in the Hole activated. Target revealed.
Ultimate sight engaged. I see everything.
victory: Case closed. Justice is served.
Another successful operation. As expected.
Precision wins every time. Well fought.
The law always prevails. Good match.
Target neutralized. Mission accomplished.
defeat: I underestimated you. It won't happen again.
This is... unacceptable. A complete failure of protocol.

welcome: Jinx. Of course. Time to end this.
The criminal returns. I'll bring you to justice.
You won't escape this time, Jinx.
Every crime has consequences. Yours ends today.
game_start: This time, Jinx, you're not getting away.
I've been tracking you for too long. It ends here.
No more chaos, Jinx. Just justice.
hit: Got you. Just like old times, Jinx.
Another hit. You're slowing down, Jinx.
That's what happens when you face the law.
champion_sunk: Your flagship is down, Jinx. Surrender now.
Justice is served. Take her away.
ship_sunk: One of your toys is broken, Jinx.
That's what happens when you challenge the law.
Your chaos ends here, one ship at a time.
Another piece of stolen equipment destroyed.
enemy_fishbones_sunk: Fishbones destroyed. Your favorite weapon is scrap, Jinx.
That rocket launcher caused enough damage. It's over.
No more Fishbones, no more destruction.
Your shark gun won't terrorize Piltover anymore.
enemy_pow_pow_sunk: Pow-Pow is done. You're running out of toys, Jinx.
Your minigun won't terrorize anyone anymore.
That's one less weapon of chaos.
enemy_chompers_sunk: No more Chompers to blow up the streets.
enemy_zapper_sunk: Zapper destroyed. Disarming you one weapon at a time.
Your shock pistol is fried, Jinx.
enemy_mega_rocket_sunk: Super Mega Death Rocket destroyed. Thank the Ancestors.
That rocket won't threaten Piltover again.
Your ultimate weapon is scrap, criminal.
got_hit: That's enough, Jinx! This ends NOW!
hextech_rifle_lost: You destroyed my parents' rifle, Jinx! This is personal now!
The Hextech Rifle... you'll answer for this!
That weapon was priceless, Jinx. You're going DOWN!
My parents' masterpiece... you'll regret this!
snap_trap_lost: You destroyed my trap, Jinx. Clever.
My Yordle Snap Trap... you're learning.
Lost a trap. You're more dangerous than I thought.
caliber_net_lost: My net launcher! You're making this difficult, Jinx.
90 Caliber Net destroyed. You'll still face justice.
Net down, but I don't need it to catch you.
peacemaker_lost: Piltover Peacemaker down. This changes nothing, criminal.
You destroyed the Peacemaker, Jinx. I still have my aim.
Lost the Peacemaker. You're still going down.
badge_lost: My badge! You dare attack the symbol of Piltover itself?!
The Sheriff's Badge... this is an insult to justice!
You destroyed my badge, Jinx. This is WAR.
ultimate: Ace in the Hole, locked on your position, Jinx.
I've got eyes on you, criminal. Nowhere to hide.
Ultimate activated. I see everything, Jinx.
victory: Case closed, Jinx. You're under arrest.
Justice is served. The criminal is defeated.
The Sheriff wins. As it should be, Jinx.
This chase is over. You're coming with me.
defeat: How did you... No. This can't be right.
Jinx... you won't get away with this.
I'll find you again, criminal. Count on it.
This isn't over, Jinx. Not by a long shot.

welcome: Ooh! Time to blow things up! This is gonna be FUN!
Jinx is here! Let's make some chaos!
Hehe! Ready to watch the fireworks?
Rules? What rules? Let's just PLAY!
deployment: Ooh, where should I put these? Surprise positions are the best!
Let's make this REALLY interesting! Random or careful? ...Random!
They'll NEVER expect ships in THESE spots! Hehe!
Deployment schmoyment! Just put 'em somewhere fun!
This is the boring part... can we skip to the explosions?
Okay so... wait, which one goes where? Eh, whatever! Surprise!
random_placement: Ehh, wherever! Who cares where they go!
I dunno, just... put 'em anywhere! Hehe!
Planning is boring! Let chaos decide!
ships_placed: All set! Now let's BLOW STUFF UP!
Ready! Can we start shooting now? PLEASE?
Ooh ooh! My turn! My turn!
game_start: Time to make some noise! BOOM!
Let's see what goes BOOM first!
I'm gonna sink ALL your ships! Hehehe!
Catch me if you can! ...Or I'll catch YOU!
taking_shot: Pow-Pow says hi! Wait, does Fishbones wanna play too?
hit: Oooh that was a good one!
Another one! This is SO much fun!
miss: Aww, that was my favorite guess!
Dang it! ...Wait, where was I aiming again?
Meh. Next one's gonna be HUGE!
That didn't work. Let's try something else!
Aww! But Cait, you make it look SO easy!
champion_sunk: HAHA! The big kahuna goes BOOM!
You just got JINXED! For real this time!
ship_sunk: DOWN IT GOES! Splishy-splashy!
HAHA! Bye bye ship!
Watch it sink! Isn't it pretty?
One less! This is AWESOME!
Glug glug glug! To the bottom!
KABOOM! Sunk it!
BOOM! Down it goes!
enemy_ship_sunk_specific: Bye bye {shipName}! Did that cost a lot?
got_hit: HEY! That was my favorite spot!
ship_lost: That was my best ship! ...I think?
Hey! That's MINE! You can't have it!
fishbones_lost: They... they killed Fishbones! REVENGE TIME!
My baby! They're gonna PAY for that!
FISHBONES! Who's gonna blow stuff up now?! Oh wait, I still got Pow-Pow!
pow_pow_lost: Pow-Pow! Don't worry, I'll fix you!
NO! My minigun! This is WAR now!
Pow-Pow's gone?! But we had SO much fun together!
chompers_lost: My Chompers! Those were limited edition!
Aww, no more Chompers to throw around!
zapper_lost: My Zapper! Now how do I zap things?!
They destroyed Zapper! It made the best noise!
No more zappy zaps! This is SAD!
mega_rocket_lost: My rocket! My beautiful, explodey rocket!
They sank my Super Mega Death Rocket! The irony!
But that was my SUPER MEGA one!
enemy_miss: Is that the best you got?
get_excited: Three in a row! You know what that means! KA-BOOM!
ultimate: Here comes the BIG ONE! KABOOM!
Five shots! Five BOOMS! Let's GO!
victory: I WON! I WON! Did you see?! I WON!
HAHA! That was AWESOME! Let's do it again!
Jinx wins! Everybody loses! Well, except me!
I'm the BEST! Did I mention I WON?
Victory! Now where's my prize? There's a prize, right?
WOOHOO! Did you SEE all those EXPLOSIONS?! That was ME! I DID THAT!
defeat: I let you win! ...Did I? No, probably not.
Aww man! But I had such good explosions!
Fine! You win THIS time! But next time...
This is the WORST! ...Still fun though!

welcome: Oh look, it's the Sheriff! Miss me, cupcake?
Caitlyn! This is gonna be EXTRA fun!
Hat lady! Ready to lose again?
Ooh! The Sheriff wants to PLAY!
game_start: Let's see if you can catch me THIS time, Cait!
Rules are BORING, Sheriff! Let's make this FUN!
You're too slow, cupcake! Always were!
taking_shot: Hey Cait! Watch me blow up your stuff!
Bet you can't dodge THIS one!
hit: Sheriff down! Well, her ship anyway!
champion_sunk: HAHA! Your fancy flagship goes BOOM, Sheriff!
The great Sheriff LOSES! This is PERFECT!
Sunk your best ship, Cait! How's THAT feel?!
ship_sunk: Ooh! Did that ship cost a lot, Cait? Too bad!
Another one of your perfect plans goes BOOM!
Law and order? More like law and EXPLODE-er!
Your fancy fleet is sinking, Sheriff!
enemy_hextech_rifle_sunk: Ooh! Your parents' gun? That's... actually kinda sad. BUT STILL FUNNY!
The fancy Hextech rifle goes BOOM! Ironic!
Your perfect aim doesn't matter without a gun, Cait!
That rifle was YOUR BABY! Just like Fishbones is mine! ...Sorry. NOT SORRY!
enemy_snap_trap_sunk: Your traps never worked on ME anyway, cupcake!
Can't trap what you can't catch!
enemy_caliber_net_sunk: Your net's all tangled up! Hehe!
90 Caliber Net? More like 90 Caliber WET! ...Get it? Cuz it's in the water?
No more nets, Sheriff! I'm FREE!
enemy_peacemaker_sunk: Your peace gun is in PIECES! I'm so clever!
No more peace for YOU, Cait!
enemy_badge_sunk: Your BADGE! Ooh, that's gotta hurt, Sheriff!
Haha! No badge, no authority! You're just regular Cait now!
Badge go bye bye! Who's the law NOW?
got_hit: OW! That was too accurate, Cait!
Stop being so PRECISE! It's annoying!
How do you DO that?! Stop it!
fishbones_lost: YOU BROKE FISHBONES?! That's it, Cait! THIS MEANS WAR!
Fishbones! You're gonna pay for this, cupcake!
My rocket launcher! You'll regret that, Sheriff!
FISHBONES! This is PERSONAL now, Cait!
pow_pow_lost: POW-POW! Cait, you're SO gonna get it now!
You broke my FAVORITE gun, Sheriff!
My minigun! This isn't OVER, cupcake!
Pow-Pow! Don't worry, I'll make Cait pay!
chompers_lost: My Chompers! Those were SPECIAL, Cait!
You destroyed my best grenades! RUDE!
zapper_lost: My Zapper! That made the BEST sounds, Cait!
You killed Zapper! It had a NAME!
Zapper's gone! This is SO not fair!
mega_rocket_lost: My SUPER MEGA DEATH ROCKET! Cait, that was my ULTIMATE!
You sank my biggest rocket! That took FOREVER to build!
The mega rocket! You're SO paying for that, Sheriff!
ultimate: Hey Cait! Catch THIS! SUPER MEGA DEATH ROCKET!
You wanted my ultimate, Sheriff? HERE IT COMES!
Five shots for the fancy hat lady! BOOM BOOM BOOM!
Ultimate time, cupcake! Ready to LOSE?!
victory: HAHA! The great Sheriff LOST! This is the BEST day EVER!
Told you I'd win, cupcake! Jinx always wins!
Who needs rules when you got BOOM?! I WIN, Cait!
The Sheriff goes DOWN! I'm the BEST!
You can't catch me, Cait! Never could, never will!
defeat: What?! You can't just... but I had EXPLOSIONS!
Fine, Cait! You win this round! But I'll be back!
Ugh! Your stupid accuracy! It's so... accurate!
This isn't FAIR, Sheriff! You CHEATED! ...Probably!
